text: Make a Graham Cracker Pie Crust by melting 1/2 cup butter, adding 2 tablespoons of brown sugar, and mixing in 1 1/2 cups crushed graham crackers. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes, then cool. In the microwave, or over low heat on the stove, melt 1/2 cup butter and 4 squares unsweetened baking cocoa.  Place this hot mixture into an electric mixer, add 1 cup sugar, and beat well, until smooth and creamy.  Add 3 drops peppermint extract.  Add 3 large eggs, one at a time, blending each one well before adding the next.  Pour into pie crust.  Cool completely in the refrigerator.  Cut in very small slices (it's very rich! ). Top with a dollop of real whipped cream.  Optional -- top with one leaf fresh mint.
